title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.11 - Corrections and restorations to lists
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.11 - Corrections and restorations to lists

State Regulations

Any person eligible for inclusion in any list filed with
the commission who was omitted or who was subsequently removed from such list
pursuant to section
7.10
of this Part may be included
or restored to such list upon application by the employer if the commission
determines that sufficient cause exists for such inclusion or restoration. Any
person removed from a voluntary gang pursuant to section
7.10
of this Part may be restored
for good cause to such gang by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
7.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
